attributes.action: confer with Rt Hon Caroline Flint,  Secretary of State for Communities and Housing, to prevent further land sales on the Chase Farm Hospital site ( please refer to PI ref:APP/Q5300/A/07/2043/798/NWF).This land is needed for the urgent development of Primary and Secondary care, for residents of Enfield, Barnet, Haringey and South Hertfordshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this area there is an urgent need to improve primary care as well as hospital services. It would be wrong to sell off this land before sites have been identified for these developements; especially as there is no guarantee that the proceeds from this land sale would be reinvested back into the local community for healthcare purposes.
